ygData.subject: Re: Grand Opening!
ygData.msgSnippet: THe last few days while in search of Griffennes to hunt for my Griffenne charms I found that greens can be you best friends while hunting with charm.  Normally
ygData.messageBody:
THe last few days while in search of Griffennes to hunt for my Griffenne
charms I found that greens can be you best friends while hunting with
charm. Normally we use charm on two similar blues and have them beat each
other senseless. Now what happens if you are unable to find 2 blues and
you really need to kill that Uber mob?

A few days ago me a level 27 bard and a my friend a level 29 wizzie
decided to kill Griffenne in hopes of me getting a wonderful bracer to add
to my collection. What I noticed was that after two or three successful
charms on the Griff, my wizzie friend was able to nuke 3 times in a row
with his biggest nuke with out being agroed against. Now what can you do
if you only have a uber blue and some greens. Charm the blue a few times.
He will now be agro against you and will ingnore you completely. Now find
a green mob that is as fast as the uber blue and charm it and get it to
attack the uber blue. What I found is a griffawn can take down a
griffenne in about 4-5 charms on the Griffawn ^_^. Got my charm in that
manner.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Bard who will be heading to Rathe Mtns in search of a lambent stone for a
wonderful Lambent bracer.
